Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to the establishment of regional arts, cultural affairs, and parks accessibility grants
Summary: Establishes regional arts, cultural affairs, and parks accessibility grants for ten regions throughout the state for accessibility programs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to the establishment of regional arts, cultural affairs, and parks accessibility grants
